tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Smriti is an exceptional dentist, especially for Invisalign treatment. She combines kindness with a gentle approach, making every visit comfortable. Dr. Smriti's professionalism and attention to detail ensure excellent results. Her caring nature and clear explanations make the entire process smooth and stress-free. I highly recommend Dr. Smriti to anyone seeking top-notch dental care with a personal touch.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Most trust worthy doctor and very friendly with the children. Everything was explained very nicely and it was easy to take descision for such an expensive treatment. Highly recommended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Smriti is a thorough professional, who takes into consideration what is in the best interest of her patient . Embarking on my invisalign journey with her has been an absolute delight. She has become our go to for all things "teeth".

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was suffering from abnormal pain in my mouth and gums and joint areas near my eyes. No pattern but this could happen at any point of time during the day and frequency of having this pain was on weekly basis.  I visited multiple dentist but unfortunately no one was able to properly diagnose and suggest what can be done to ease the pain. Someone then recommended to go to Nanda Dental Clinic and meet Dr. Smriti over there. She was able to understand the issue in just one go/one visit and thereafter she suggested me to wear invasaligners. My treatment is still ongoing but I have had this pain only twice in last 21 weeks and that too for only an hour or so. I'm so pleased with the overall expertise she carries and the way she understood the issue. She is very approachable and reachable at any hour of the day.  Thank you Dr.Smriti.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Straightening of teeth ( Invisalign ) - Removable option,
review: I began my invisalign treatment with Dr Smriti today, and it was smooth and effective. I had almost no wait time and the appointment took no longer than 40 minutes. She placed the attachments on my teeth and gave me clear instructions on how to use my invisalgner’s. She also was very patient in teaching me how to put on and remove my trays - which was super helpful! My experience with Dr Smriti on my invisalign treatment has been hassle free and very comfortable. If you have wanted to always get your teeth straightened - then this is the place!
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I have had the good fortune of having Dr Smriti Nanda as my dentist. She is a thorough professional, her staff too is very welcoming.  
Dr Smriti is a such a  warm person and her beautiful smile and friendly demeanor puts one at ease. I am happy with my dental transformational journey with Invisalign under her supervision & highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Today I went for a consultation with Dr Smriti regarding Invisalign treatment and regular dental checkup n cleaning process.  She explained the whole process of Invisalign in detail and with patience to make me understand the treatment required for me. She was very pleasant and gentle in checking my teeth properly. Loved the entire process and completely satisfied with my visit today. The clinic is very clean and the entire staff is very pleasant. I Highly recommend Nanda dental clinic .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
********* *******. I went for teeth cleaning for myself and dental filling soft my daughter. Dr. Smriti Nanda is very gentle with my daughter and she loved visiting. 
Dr. Prashant conducted my cleaning. He is pleasant and the my appoint started on time. The actual cleaning was painless, quick and perfect. 
Highly recommend both Dr. Smriti Nanda as well as De Prashant Nanda.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Both Smriti and Prashant are very approachable. They respond to messages immediately and accommodate their patients as soon as possible. Their staff is also very friendly. Highly recommend this young doctor couple. Always a cheerful smile on their faces!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: It was an absolute delight contrary to common belief of the stress of being in a dentist’s chair.. she explained the situation and handled it very well .. I had visited for my 7 year old as his permanent teeth have started coming but the milk teeth have not shed yet, and was expecting she would recommend extraction. However she observed and recommended to not go through the trauma and stress and was not required. Very friendly and helped calming not just the patient but also the stressed parents. Highly recommend.
